doc.after: Odwalla uses what it characterizes as fresh sourced produce fruits and vegetables that have recently been harvested to make many of its products 2 40 as well as organic oats for food bars and certain tropical fruits in a frozen pur e form purchased from an outside source and blended with fruit juice 2 25 Because Odwalla uses fresh produce some juices are seasonal 41 42 Fruit availability and price is also affected by adverse weather disease and natural disasters 25 Throughout the year Odwalla juice colors and flavors change slightly because different types of fruit are used 13 40
